definitions.title: vb. shut up, stop up
definitions.body: (Aram. [[סְכַר]], skar shut up, stop up, dam up; Ar. skara fill, stop up, dam (river), etc., also also close, stop up door, Lane:1390; As. sikêru, dam up, II. 2. stop ears; cf. sikkuru, bolt Dl:HWB 499; appar. kindr. with [[סגר]];—hence Egypt. t’akar, barrier, Bondi:88);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. ´[[יִסָּכֵר פִּי וגו]] Ps 63:12 the mouth of liars shall be stopped; 3 mpl. [[וַיִּסָּֽכְרוּ]] Ge 8:2 (P) and the springs of the deep etc., were shut up.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְסִכַרְתִּ֫י אֶת־מִחְרַיִם בְּיַד]] Is 19:4 and I will shut up (deliver) Egypt into the hand of, etc. (cf. [[סגר]], [[מגן]]). p. 171, 689
